app.api.secret.email.subject: Your secret link from Vivian & Davy
app.metadata.description: The website for our wedding in 2024.
app.metadata.title: Vivian & Davy
components.error-page.status-code.401: You are not authorized to view this page
components.error-page.status-code.403: You are not allowed to view this page
components.event-details.descriptions.lo: Use a secret link to view the event details. Guests can get a secret link from the <flyoutlink text="guest invitation" to="invitation"></flyoutlink> section.
components.event-details.title: Event Details
components.flyouts.invitation.descriptio: Please provide your email to check if you are on the guest list.
components.flyouts.invitation.errors.inv: The email should be formatted like username@domain.com.
components.flyouts.invitation.errors.not: Your email was not found on the guest list. Let the host know.
components.flyouts.invitation.errors.rat: You have requested too many emails. Please wait an hour before trying again.
components.flyouts.invitation.messages.e:
We have sent an email to {{email}} with a secret link to your invitation.

The email may be sent to your junk mail. Please consider add host@vivian-and-davy.com to your allowlist to receive future updates.
components.flyouts.invitation.title: Guest Invitation
components.flyouts.rsvp.errors.missing-a: Please let us know if you are attending.
components.flyouts.rsvp.errors.missing-m: Please leave a message for the bride and groom.
components.flyouts.rsvp.guests.descripti: Your guest party has multiple members. You may select and respond on behalf of your other party members.
components.flyouts.rsvp.options.entree-d: Oven roasted chicken stuffed with mushrooms, spinach, and truffle
Grilled atlantic salmon with teriyaki glaze and sesame seeds
Asian stir fry vegetables with ginger soy sauce
components.flyouts.rsvp.questions.attend: Will you be able to join us at our wedding? Kindly reply by the date of April 15, 2024.
components.flyouts.rsvp.questions.dietar: Do you have any dietary restrictions or food allergies that we should be aware of? Leave blank if none.
components.flyouts.rsvp.questions.entree: Please indicate the entrée option you wish to be served.
components.flyouts.rsvp.questions.mailin: What is your mailing address for post-wedding postage? Leave this blank if you do not wish to receive it.
components.flyouts.rsvp.questions.messag: Share how you know the couple, wish them well or some wisdom for the future!
components.flyouts.rsvp.saved-changes: The response has been saved. Thank you for taking the time to respond!
components.flyouts.rsvp.title: RSVP
You have unsaved changes for {{guest}}'s response. Are you sure you want to discard the unsaved changes to close this form?
You have unsaved changes for {{currentGuest}}'s response. Are you sure you want to discard the unsaved changes to switch to {{selectedGuest}}'s response?
components.flyouts.songs.description: Want to hear a song at the wedding? Let us know by submitting song requests!
components.flyouts.songs.title: Song Requests
components.frequently-asked-questions.an: You can respond on the wedding website by navigating to the <flyoutlink text="guest invitation" to="invitation"></flyoutlink> section. You will be prompted for your email address to receive an email with a secret link for submitting your RSVP.
The email may be sent to your junk mail. Please add host@vivian-and-davy.com to your allow to ensure our emails arrive into your inbox.
The dress code is formal attire. Please avoid <coloredbox color="{{bride}}"></coloredbox> and <coloredbox color="{{groom}}"></coloredbox> unless you want to match the bridal party.
Please submit your RSVP by April 15, 2024.
components.frequently-asked-questions.qu: How can I respond to the invitation?
I did not receive any emails for the event. What do I do?
components.guest-list.columns.name: Name
components.mega-menu.menu-items.invitati: Get a secret link to view your invitation
components.mega-menu.menu-items.rsvp.des: Let us know if you will be attending
components.mega-menu.menu-items.sign-out: Get a secret link to view your invitation
components.mega-menu.menu-items.songs.de: Request songs you want to hear
components.navigation-bar.title: Vivian & Davy
components.scavenger-hunt.instructions: Share the love! Please upload your photos to our album! We will share our favorites on our website.
components.scavenger-hunt.items.candid-m: a candid moment of the bride & groom
components.scavenger-hunt.title: Scavenger Hunt
